title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the dialog details, there are several issues that need to be addressed:
i. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second column could be merged.

OB: 
- marking between button and list is too large

EB: 
- The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
- The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item.
- The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
- It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.

SR: 
To reproduce the issues: 
1. Open the modify parameters dialog.
2. Change a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe how the preview is cut off.
